I honestly wish they make more movies that show humans good intentions rather than evil on both ends. Wtf is the world coming to. 

The only good movie I’ve watched was kingdom of heaven. While it showed both sides Muslims/Christians and was based in the old days it clearly shows compassion between people and respect. Something this film lacks.
